Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel - good quality”
Reviews.Author: JasmineD2
Reviews.Content: days time stay impressed clean comfortable friendly competent staff wonderful garden wed recommend gardenview location stops ubahn town short walk towards hackescher markt stops 10 tram prenzlauer berg try renting bikes hotel €10 day breakfast extra downside worth skipping breakfast elsewhere otherwise marks happily stay
